channel.title: RUN.BAT error, plz help!
channel.description:
Hey,
My RUN.BAT on my SOURCE looks like this: [code]@echo off title Battlescape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
When i run it, it says the servers online, but its not. Whenever i run other sources and it says its online, it is, so its just this RUN.BAT. How can i fix this?

item.title: RUN.BAT error, plz help!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The server is online, it’s just you cannot connect. It could be a client port thing or a server port.

Go to server.java and look for 43594, or 5555. It should be set to 43594 (As it’s what most clients use). Also, when you try to connect does it say anything on the box? The server could be blocking the client you use from connecting.

If nothing appears then the client isn’t reaching the server at all.

[hr]

It’s battlescape, it probably has its own client.

Read full topic

item.title: RUN.BAT error, plz help!

item.description:

Could you please tell me the process to fixing it?
Thanks

item.title: RUN.BAT error, plz help!
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

The source is probably using a different port then the client

Read full topic
